in a loyal way or a way that can be trusted: He served the family faithfully for 40 years.promise faithfully She promised faithfully (= made a firm promise) that she would never leave him. Yours faithfully B2 mainly UK
used at the end of a formal letter beginning with "Dear Sir" or "Dear Madam": I look forward to a reply at your earliest convenience. Yours faithfully, Thomas Jackson
